Key Match Events: Porzingis recorded 11 points, five rebounds, two assists, and two blocks en route to a 109-86 win
Post-Match Reflections: Porzingis discussed the challenge of returning from his injury
Joe Mazzulla acknowledged the difficulty of returning from injury but praised Porzingis' defense
Miscellaneous Highlights: Porzingis is averaging 17.7 points, 6.3 rebounds, 1.7 assists, and 1.5 blocks on 44.9/34.3/84.2 shooting splits
The Celtics' paint defense has improved from 26th to fourth since Porzingis' return
Others: Porzingis is defending 17.6 field goals per game, which is the most on the team
He has a 47.9 defensive field goal percentage
